Title: Kadachit
Writer: Girish Joshi (story and screenplay), Prashant Dalvi (dialogue)
Actors: Ashwini Bhave, Sachin Khedekar, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Tushar Dalvi
Plot: The relationship between Gayatri and her father, whom she accused of killing her mother. 20 years later, she feels that he might be innocent.
